Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: Zammit's scientific approach to archaeology further enhanced his international reputation. A permanent display of some of his findings may be viewed at the National Museum of Archaeology in Valletta. The main Assembly Hall of the University of Malta bears Zammit's name. He also appears on a commemorative 1973 Maltese pound coin. Zammit signed most of his works with his initials T. Z.
